Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Requires applications for certain licenses to include specific information to evaluate such license applications for compliance with the goals set forth in the climate leadership and community protection act
Summary: Requires applications for licenses granted by certain entities to include specific information to enable such entities to evaluate such license applications for compliance with the goals set forth in the New York state climate leadership and community protection act.
LawCode: Add ยง403, St Ad Proc Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the state administrative procedure act, in relation to requiring state agencies to evaluate bids and license applications for compliance with the goals set forth in the New York state climate leadership and community protection act
